ygData.subject: Re: Clouding
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Could you clarify your and in that statement?  If you sing Clouding while anyone in your group is camoed or invised, they are visible (not to you but to
ygData.messageBody:
On Tue, 15 Feb 2000, Daniel P. Sniderman wrote:
>
> Speaking of Clouding - it has been failing big time lately by Mobs that
> are now green to me in Mistmoore. When I was in my mid-to-upper 20's - I
> could sing it and get from the zone to the Graveyard completely unmolested.
> The Initiates and what have you that spawn along the way would never be a
> problem.
>
> Starting a couple weeks ago - they would go agro on me when singing
> Clouding and when Regular (not Superior) Camouflage is cast on me. This is
> a major train generator.

Could you clarify your "and" in that statement? If you sing
Clouding while anyone in your group is camoed or invised, they
are visible (not to you but to the mobs) every time your song
pulses. This is pretty easy to demonstrate - have a group
member cast invis on you while you are singing clouding.
Target a far-away mob and /con it repeatedly. Every time your
song pulses, it can see you and the /con message will change.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
